00017 // Definicoes de uso externo:
00018 typedef struct{
00019         struct timeval     timereset;
00020         struct timeval     time;
00021 }timestruct_t;
00022 
00023 // Prototipos de uso externo:
00024 
00025 // Prototipos de uso externo (inline):
00031 inline void time_reset(timestruct_t *ptimestruct)
00032 {
00033         gettimeofday(&ptimestruct->timereset, NULL);
00034 }                      
00035 
00041 inline double time_gettime(timestruct_t *ptimestruct)
00042 {
00043         gettimeofday(&ptimestruct->time, NULL);
00044         return (ptimestruct->time.tv_sec - ptimestruct->timereset.tv_sec) + 1e-6 * (ptimestruct->time.tv_usec - ptimestruct->timereset.tv_usec);
00045 }                      
00046

00049 }
